titleStmt.title: A transcription of the Estoria de Espanna in Y
titleStmt.funder: This transcription was made as part of the "An electronic research environment and edition of the Estoria de Espanna of Alfonso X, King of Castile and Leon", which has received funding from the Arts and Humanities Research Council (AHRC).

projectDesc.p: This transcription was made by the Estoria de Espanna project.

editorialDecl.p: This transcription was prepared by the transcribers using the Textual Communities system at the University of Saskatchewan. This tool provided transcribers with the ability to work on transcriptions of individual folios whose images were accompanied by a transcription space. An automatic parser in the Textual Communities system ensured that only correctly expressed xml was entered into the system.
